author: bridge-bot
content: <Barrywhitehat> Ah not sure its intersting. Its more that i wanted to route this idea to you to see if it is intersting ;)

author: abcoathup
content: Special contributions such as satellites are potentially newsworthy, so generate more attention and more participation to the ceremony.

author: bridge-bot
content:
<glamperd> > <glamperd>  Their online doco is not extensive, but it says that all communications with the satellite are open to anyone. That's OK as long as we can derive some randomness locally, which doesn't seem like too much to ask. I have reached out to them to find out more. (re @kzg_ceremony_bot: <Trent Van Epps> special contribution interest inbound to keep in mind for later

> Cryptosat.
> They launch satellites to run nodes in space.
> Barry mentioned that it might be interesting to have a satellite participate in the trusted setup for protodanksharding.)

author: alex.eth
content: Looks like their first sat went up earlier this year on SpaceX Transporter-5 mission....
